headline: Jim Cramer’s Take on Regeneron Pharmaceuticals (REGN): Bold Predictions for the Future
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Jim Cramer’s Bold Predictions About These 10 Healthcare Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ:REGN) stands against the other healthcare stocks Jim Cramer has made bold predictions about. Healthcare has been one of Jim Cramer’s favorite topics lately. […]
